Author: Muramblend
Title: [ANN][ICO][BETA]✅✅🔥🔥Developer Platform for Mass Adoption🔥🔥✅✅KryptoPal[KPX]
Body: Thanks for the interest in the project, we have made alot of progress on the development side and will continue to sign on clients for the platform.  We have plans to list on exchanges and are working out details now. For regulatory reasons I cannot state too many details until everything is finalized but making sure there is a market and liquidity for the token is something we are taking seriously and are prepared to take care of. But can say we plan on having the token available for trading as soon as the sale is completed.

Author: langnhangvl
Title: [ANN][ICO][BETA]✅✅🔥🔥Developer Platform for Mass Adoption🔥🔥✅✅KryptoPal[KPX]
Body: You might want to look at KryptoPal that way: KryptoPal is a development platform for mass Blockchain adoption. KryptoPal conveniently helps developers to bootstrap Blockchain development by providing free infrastructure with full nodes, live multi-purpose smart contracts and a suite of fully developed APIs.

Author: Muramblend
Title: [ANN][ICO][BETA]✅✅🔥🔥Developer Platform for Mass Adoption🔥🔥✅✅KryptoPal[KPX]
Body: Hey All!! We have announced another partnership with a great insurtech firm that provides risk mitigation solutions to reduce workplace crimes. They are using the KryptoPal platform and providing expertise in insurance to the KryptoPal team. If you have not heard InsurTech is becoming very big and has generated year-over-year growth in funding. We're very excited to have a well regarded partner in the space.  https://i.imgur.com/qShRHKsl.jpg   "IBV is hoping that using blockchain technology in this fashion will help prevent negligent hiring and reduce workplace crimes that are currently costing businesses $50 billion annually."   Check out the full article: https://coinjournal.net/using-blockchain-technology-to-prevent-workplace-crimes/

Author: Muramblend
Title: [ANN][ICO][BETA]✅✅🔥🔥Developer Platform for Mass Adoption🔥🔥✅✅KryptoPal[KPX]
Body: Happy to announce one of our many partnerships to come:  KryptoPal will be used by Swiss non-profit Help2Kids to create a cryptocurrency donation and payment network. The one year pilot will reduce costs and increase efficiency and transparency in donations to schools and orphanages in Tanzania and Malawi. After the pilot we aim to expand such networks across Asia and South America.  Article on Coin Telegraph  https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/725_Ly9jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS9zdG9yYWdlL3VwbG9hZHMvdmlldy9mODdhMzAzMWVhYTIxYjI4M2UyODQ4MWI4NmEyMjJjZi5qcGc=.jpg

Title: [ANN][ICO][BETA]✅✅🔥🔥Developer Platform for Mass Adoption🔥🔥✅✅KryptoPal[KPX]
Body: Exactly. There are millions of developers around the world building websites, applications, and IoT devices everyday and many of them want to build on the blockchain but can't because it is too intimidating, difficult, and expensive. By providing this solution, these developers can immediately begin integrating these websites with the blockchain. This will grow the ecosystem significantly and make our crypto more usefull.

Author: Muramblend
Title: [ANN][ICO][BETA]✅✅🔥🔥Developer Platform for Mass Adoption🔥🔥✅✅KryptoPal[KPX]
Body: The platform was built in Java.   ready for the mainnet in two months, not two years. We will support 30+ languages, provide hosted nodes which reduce and a connective fabric to combine all of the applications, websites, and devices if people want to.  Also, it is not just for websites, but also IoT Devices, applications and even point of sale systems.  Most projects that have attempted this do not offer hosted nodes or provide a connective fabric. If you are a developer entering the space and you want to create applications, it is too expensive and complex if you need to maintain and pay for hosting a full node in order to create proof of concepts or integrate websites to use smart contracts. Providing these nodes for developers means we open an entire new market that would otherwise not participate due to cost and complexity.  Let me know if this addresses your questions,
